strapiPost.title: New Playground Open At Ozark Highlands Nature Center
strapiPost.content:
A new playground is open at the J.B. and Johnelle Hunt Family Ozark Highlands Nature Center in Springdale, providing another fantastic activity for kids to learn about and engage with the outdoors.

  • Active play: The 4,200-sq-ft playground has six interactive stations, including a boulder cavern, a cargo net climbing platform, stepping stumps, and multiple log climbing stations to activate kids' adventurous sides.
  • Homemade: The playground was constructed by Natural State Treehouses using locally sourced timbers and was made possible by the Arkansas Game and Fish Commission and a generous grant from the Walton Family Foundation.

Learn more about the Ozark Highlands Nature Center HERE.
